name: Untitled Board Game: Gooseless Edition
description:
War's been declared. Hex War! In this conflict, you're only as strong as your surrounding comrades. Keep your company strong and you'll become stronger yourself. Isolate yourself and you'll be dead before you know it. 

Controls exclusively with the mouse.

Click on a piece to select it. Click on the tile you wish to move to in order to move there. Enemy tiles can only be defeated on the battlefield (represented as the red tiles)

FEATURES:

  • An easy to learn but difficult to master rule set!
  • Support for local multiplayer and vs CPU play!
  • The ability to change the background color!
  • The option to play with the board on the left OR right side of the screen!
